se.kth.ict.npj.hw1.client
Class HangmanClientConnection

java.lang.Object
  se.kth.ict.npj.hw1.client.HangmanClientConnection

public class HangmanClientConnection
extends java.lang.Object

HangmanClientConnection is the responsible object for the TCP connection of the client with the Hangman Server. It provides the interface to GUI to start a new game, try a word and try a letter
